name: Sientra, Inc.
description: Sientra, Inc. is a medical device company specializing in aesthetic products, particularly breast implants and other plastic surgery solutions. Founded in 2011, Sientra is committed to providing innovative products that enhance the lives of patients seeking aesthetic procedures. The company markets its products directly to plastic surgeons and focuses on the highest standards of quality and safety. Sientra's flagship product offerings include its silicone breast implants, which are known for their advanced design and durability, as well as a range of other aesthetic solutions that cater to the needs of both patients and surgeons. The company differentiates itself through a unique, culturally relevant marketing approach and a commitment to patient education, ensuring that individuals seeking cosmetic enhancement are well-informed about their options. Sientra also invests in clinical studies to further demonstrate the safety and efficacy of its products, fostering trust and confidence among healthcare providers and patients alike. With a mission to empower patients through education and choice, Sientra remains dedicated to innovation and excellence in the aesthetic medical device field.

seo.meta_title: Sientra, Inc. | Innovative Aesthetic Medical Devices
seo.meta_description: Explore Sientra, Inc., a leader in aesthetic medical devices specializing in breast implants and plastic surgery solutions. Discover our commitment to safety and innovation.

faq.question: What products does Sientra offer?
faq.answer: Sientra offers silicone and saline breast implants, along with various aesthetic medical devices.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Sientra?
faq.answer: Jeffrey M. Nugent is the CEO of Sientra, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Sientra headquartered?
faq.answer: Sientra is headquartered in Santa Barbara, California, USA.
